title: Nicolle Wallace | David Cross | Trump Says He’s "Being Nice" While Lying About Health Care: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump's closing argument for the midterms: lying about health care, immigration and a made-up tax cut.

Then, Nicolle Wallace talks about Trump's attacks on the press, her tenure in the Bush administration and why she thinks it's important for Democrats to take the House and Senate. She takes the conversation backstage exclusive for the podcast.

Then, David Cross explains the chain of events that led to him being interviewed by the Secret Service and talks about his efforts to help fight voter suppression. He also speaks backstage at Studio 8G just for the podcast.


LATE NIGHT ON SOCIAL
